name: PlugTheme_List
author: Abhinav Kumar

sections.description:
This plugin which is simple in its funcationality and in its name(haha). This plugin provide a simple and aesthetic list of plugins and themes that are installed in your site. This plugin shows there current version and if there is any update present for given wp-contents (represent both themes and plugins ). This is first iteration of this plugin so, fasten your seat belt
because with every new update you would feel the thrust.
sections.installation:
Follow these steps for easy installation or if you fiddle, then (best of luck)-

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Follow these steps for easy installation or if you fiddle, then (best of luck)-

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
